item.description:
Join us for the 2nd Annual Casino Royale Charity fundraiser- a black-tie optional event to benefit the Home for Little Wanderers. Held at the Mandarin Oriental Hotel Boston, the event features casino games ($100 worth of casino chips included in your ticket purchase), silent auction and sponsored cocktails from 8-9pm. This will be a very fun and glamorous event for a wonderful cause!

We will meet inside the main entrance to the event, near the ticket area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

General Admission tickets are $100. They must be purchased in advance at:

http://thehomecharity...

Each member is responsible for their own ticket purchase.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet inside the main entrance to the event, near the ticket area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: 2nd Annual Casino Royale Charity Event Benefiting Home for Little Wanderer
